features: Gently cleanses and refreshes sensitive skin
body.description: Olay Gentle Clean Foaming Cleanser gently cleanses and refreshes skin with rich foamy lather. Specially formulated for sensitive skin, this cleanser is 100% soap-free, oil-free, and fragrance-free, as well as allergy and dermatologist-tested for a truly gentle clean.

productInformation.name: Best Sellers Rank
productInformation.value: #34,587 in Beauty & Personal Care (See Top 100 in Beauty & Personal Care) #517 in Facial Cleansing Washes

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I found this to be very gentle on my skin, love it!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 25, 2011
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The best make-up remover
reviews.reviewText: I can swear by this product that it worksOkay first off it doesnt really help with my acne but it helps in getting everything off. I wear Eyeliner, and bb cream on my face. At the end of each day I squirt a little of this into my hand and rub it onto my eyes. Ive never had a problem with stinging but I never really open my eyes when washing them in the first place. Anywho it gets all of my eye makeup/concealer off very fast. Then I wash my eyes and then squirt a little more onto my hand and wash my face. It gets off the foundation quick. My face always feels soft after using this. I have sensitive skin so I am very careful with what I use. They gave this facewash a new look a few months back and I nearly panicked when I didnt see this at target anymore. Little did I know they were just making the bottle prettier also the price of it went up in stores. I usually paid 3-4 dollars but now its nearly 5 dollars. Buying on here save me a few bucks in the long run. (buying necessities with the "super saver shipping" policy" Im rambling now.All in all ive been using this product for the past 3 years. It doesnt hurt my skin whatsoever and it gets off all the makeup fast. It doesnt contain any acne treating ingredients but I know its keeping my skin clean day and night.Great product also shipping from this company was very quick.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars I ordered 2 & one was opened & covered inside of box. Other one was fine. Please advise.
reviews.reviewText: I do like product. Need to secure top of container better.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for sensitive skin and noses
reviews.reviewText: This is a great foaming cleanser that doesn’t sting my eyes or tickle my nose. It rinses completely leaving my dry skin soft with no dry feeling. In the evening I use an oil cleanser to remove makeup and follow with the Olay foaming cleanser to get last traces of makeup and dirt off. When I’m in a hurry I’ll double cleanse with this and my skin feels calm, never stripped dry. I recommend this for sensitive skin.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good dash wash for sensitive dry skin
reviews.reviewText: I like that it lathers up, rinses off easily and doesn’t make skin dry

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 4, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Been using this product for forever and love it. When my local drugstore didn't have it, I turned to Amazon. Got a great deal on a 4-pack. Too bad the seller doesn't know how to package things. A few bottles leaked. Nothing terrible, but enough that I had to wash and dry each bottle.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Like the multi pack
reviews.reviewText: I have been using this for years. I love that you can buy a multi pack. It doesn't have a strong smell so it doesn't conflict with other make-up or moisturizers being used. I like how a little goes a long way and gets the dirt off.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars OilOlay face soap
reviews.reviewText: Oil of Olay face soap I love it I’ve been using it for over 40 years and I wouldn’t change for nothing

reviews.reviewTitle: Makes your skin feel like velvet
reviews.reviewText: Quick easy and like a skin treatment
I love this facewash and it is the only one I use ! Light while still effectively cleaning

reviews.reviewTitle: It is perfect for sensitive skin
reviews.reviewText: I have tried many facial cleansers over the years and this is the one I have finally decided to stick to. It is perfect for sensitive skin, and doesn't leave your skin feeling dry after cleansing.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on April 21, 2016
reviews.reviewText: This face wash is not the same as pictured - I received a different looking product, as it appears Olay has reformulated the face wash. Aloe is now at the bottom of the ingredients list and my skin can definitely tell! The old face wash never dried my skin out, and the one I received from Amazon makes my skin feel tight and dry. The picture is deceptive as I was expecting to receive the previous version of the face wash.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on April 20, 2013
reviews.reviewText: I used this face wash when it was available in the shops and was very disappointed when procter and gamble stop supplying it. I have very dry and sensitive skin and can only use certain products.I bought some of the sensitive foaming face wash when I was in florida last year so I was absolutely thrilled to find I could get it from amazon
